title: SimonMed launches longevity-focused MRI program
summary: Whole-body MRI provider to roll out ‘AI-enabled preventive and longevity care’ packages at centers across the US. Diagnostic imaging provider SimonMed has launched a new longevity division, leveraging whole-body MRI and multi-modality screening in a new suite of proactive, preventive health services. Dubbed SimonMed Longevity, the new programs are designed for individuals who want to […] The post SimonMed launches longevity-focused MRI program appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Danny Sullivan
